mapper.select: SELECT na_bzplc , fhs_id_no , farm_amnno , farm_id_no , na_trpl_c , sra_farm_acno , ftsnm , zip , dongup , dongbw , ohse_telno , cus_mpno , maco_yn , rmk_cntn , jrdwo_dsc , del_yn , SRA_FED_SPY_YN FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND DEL_YN = '0' AND ANW_YN != '0' AND FTSNM LIKE '%'||#{ftsnm}||'%' ORDER BY NA_BZPLC , FHS_ID_NO
